enb_long_title: Fifth Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI)
section_title: INFORMATION ON RELEVANT ACTION BY THE GEF COUNCIL
sentences: The secretariat introduced the document on relevant action by the GEF Council (FCCC/SBI/1997/Misc.1).

The document recalls Decision 10 from COP-2, which requested the secretariat to provide information on the financial support available to non-Annex I Parties for the preparation of their national communications.
The document contains information on projects proposed by Parties, funding decisions and date and amount of funds available.
The EU noted that the interim operating entity is functioning effectively and that the GEF will be a 'cross-point' for the flow of technology.
Delegates agreed to suspend discussion of the document to allow more time for review and to revisit the issue in an informal process.
On Friday, 28 February, the Chair announced that the informal group on this issue would not complete its work by the end of the week.
The SBI will reconvene during the AGBM to consider its conclusions.
